items.name: Tiny Essence
items.description: A faint remnant of a creature's life force. Though weak, it still holds enough energy to slightly empower low-tier gear and early weapons.

items.name: Small Essence
items.description: A modest fragment of raw spirit, harvested from lesser foes. Commonly used as entry-level upgrade fuel for beginner and mid-range builds.

items.name: Medium Essence
items.description: A solid core of condensed vitality, typically found in the remains of stronger creatures. Ideal for mid-tier upgrades and solid step-up gear.

items.name: Large Essence
items.description: A solid core of condensed vitality, typically found in the remains of stronger creatures. Ideal for mid-tier upgrades and solid step-up gear.

items.name: Greater Essence
items.description: A refined and potent concentration of life force, claimed from powerful adversaries. Essential for advanced enhancements and late-game weapons.

items.name: Epic Essence
items.description: An extraordinary crystal of swirling energy, fused with the memories of countless fallen enemies. A cornerstone of high-end upgrades and signature builds.

items.name: Superior Essence
items.description: A gleaming reservoir of pure essence. Only the mightiest foes leave behind such a treasure. Used for top-tier upgrades and unlocking additional rune slots on endgame gear.

items.name: Legendary Essence
items.description: A legendary font of power, radiant with golden light. Sought by masters of the forge to achieve unmatched strength and unlock hidden rune paths.
